page.title: 06PASHLEY FARM.
page.content: At Pashley farm they do dairy farming as well as growing potatoes, wheat, grass and barley. They have rough grazing and the farm has its own bull. They feed most of the crops to the animals and if there is any surplus they sell it. The people on the farm get tested every year for T.B. They have their own machines which are: 3 tractors, 1 baler, 1 combine harvester, 1 silager and 1 muck-spreader. { { UPPER HOUSE FARM. There was only a joiner here and he said that the farm had last been in use 10 years ago. It is now a private house.
